name: HellMusic
description: A telegram voice chat music player bot, coded in python using Pyrogram and PyTgCalls

BOT_TOKEN.description: Make a bot from @BotFather and paste the bot token here.

LOGGER_ID.description: Channel/group id to log error/info messages.

HEROKU_API.description: Go to https://dashboard.heroku.com/account, scroll down and press Reveal API. Required for updater to work.

HEROKU_APP.description: The Value of App Name you filled in right on top. Required for updater to work.

HELLBOT_SESSION.description: Get this value by using repl or termux. Refer to Repo for more info.
